properties.query:
SOURCE 'f5telemetry' | fields @timestamp, @message, system.hostname
| filter system.hostname = "pazF5vm01.f5labs.gc.ca"
| parse @message "clientSideTraffic.bitsIn\":*," as clientSide_BytesIn
| parse @message "clientSideTraffic.bitsOut\":*," as clientSide_BytesOut
| parse @message "serverSideTraffic.bitsIn\":*," as serverSide_BytesIn
| parse @message "serverSideTraffic.bitsOut\":*," as serverSide_BytesOut
| stats avg(serverSide_BytesIn/8) as Bytes_In, avg(serverSide_BytesOut/8) as Bytes_Out by bin(5m)
properties.title: pazF5vm01 Client-side Throughput

properties.query:
SOURCE 'f5telemetry' | fields @timestamp, @message, system.hostname
| filter system.hostname = "pazF5vm01.f5labs.gc.ca"
| parse @message "clientSideTraffic.bitsIn\":*," as clientSide_BytesIn
| parse @message "clientSideTraffic.bitsOut\":*," as clientSide_BytesOut
| parse @message "serverSideTraffic.bitsIn\":*," as serverSide_BytesIn
| parse @message "serverSideTraffic.bitsOut\":*," as serverSide_BytesOut
| stats avg(serverSide_BytesIn/8) as Bytes_In, avg(serverSide_BytesOut/8) as Bytes_Out by bin(5m)
properties.title: pazF5vm01 Server-side Throughput

properties.query:
SOURCE 'f5telemetry' | fields @timestamp, @message, system.hostname, system.cpu, system.tmmCpu
| filter system.hostname = "pazF5vm01.f5labs.gc.ca"
| stats avg(system.cpu) as SystemCpu, avg(system.tmmCpu) as TmmCpu by bin(5m)
properties.title: pazF5vm01 CPU Utilization

properties.query:
SOURCE 'f5telemetry' | fields @timestamp, @message, system.hostname, system.memory, system.tmmMemory
| filter system.hostname = "pazF5vm01.f5labs.gc.ca"
| stats avg(system.memory) as SystemMemory, avg(system.tmmMemory) as TmmMemory by bin(5m)
properties.title: pazF5vm01 Memory Usage
